name: Locke and Riley
description:
When they learn about each other, none of them is alone any longer.

Controls
- Keyboard: WASD to move, mouse to look, E / F / click to interact
- Controller: default controls to move and look, Primary Action / Trigger to interact

Will you play this game on a stream? I'd love to see it! Please leave a link in the comments or share it in a private message!

Interested in future updated to the game? Let me know! There are tons of ideas that didn't make it into this build and I'm pondering whether to continue to add some levels and characters!
